partialText: Yuuki is, at this point, getting passed around to one girl after another like that one spare Nidoking who gets used as a stock trading stud so other trainers can evolve their Haunters and their Kadabras.

title: The Holy Grail of Eris ‒ Episode 7

title: The Invisible Man and His Soon-to-Be Wife ‒ Episode 7
